member.name: T:KTMissionGetter.Mission
member.summary: Allows access relating to the current mission.
member.remarks: On the Editor, these properties will return default values. Check the XML documentation to see the value it returns.

member.name: P:KTMissionGetter.Mission.IsPacingEvents
member.summary: Determines whether or not all pacing events are enabled. Default: .

member.name: P:KTMissionGetter.Mission.Description
member.summary: The description as it appears in the bomb binder.
member.remarks: Default: "Everybody has to start somewhere. Let's just hope it doesn't end here too.\n\nMake sure your experts have the manual and are ready to help.".

member.name: P:KTMissionGetter.Mission.DisplayName
member.summary: The mission name as it appears in the bomb binder.
